description:
The Stuff.tv app is brought to you by Stuff, the world’s best-selling gadget magazine. 

It pings all the latest tech news and gadget reviews straight to your HP TouchPad, so you can always stay on the bleeding edge of technology.

If you want to see new shiny things, you’ll find them. If you want to make an informed buying decision, you’ll find honest reviews. If you want to watch Stuff play with the latest products, you’ll find vidcasts and podcasts crammed with gadgety goodness. If you want to filter it all so you only see what interests you, you can do that too.

“Stuff is all about gadget joy, delivering everything you need to know about the latest tech without boring you silly.” – Simon Osborne-Walker, editor of Stuff.tv
versionNote:
- Enabled playback of inline youtube videos
- Content age is now localised
- Improved Content Browser Item Layout
- Improved Content Auto Refresh
- Improved in-item scrolling
- Internal Optimisations
